attributes.action: Release Official Files with Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation
attributes.additional_details: State, Secret and Security Service Files with Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation are being denied access to by central government and operations on the grounds of Exclusion Policies and Secrets Act.  The files are criminal evidence and those who legally campaign need full disclosure to them.  To obstruct criminal evidence undermines law and there can be no truth and no justice.  All data that pertains to crimes against children must be released to permit legal resolution.
attributes.background: Allow access and full disclosure to State, Secret and Security Services files with Child Sexual Abuse and Child Exploitation for those seeking legal resolution.  Such files constitute criminal evidence and are necessitated by law.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out how to request information from the Government here:

https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request
